content: The Second Sister is a main Yaoguai Chief boss fight that you can encounter at the start of Chapter 4 of Black Myth Wukong. Located in the Village of Lanxi, the Second Sister is a large spider that guards the entrance to the Webbed Hollow.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'The_Second_Sister.md', within the main section titled 'The Second Sister'.
The content is as follows:
The Second Sister is a main Yaoguai Chief boss fight that you can encounter at the start of Chapter 4 of Black Myth Wukong. Located in the Village of Lanxi, the Second Sister is a large spider that guards the entrance to the Webbed Hollow.
